title: No Loss Prevented
body: My game ended about 4 minutes ago, we had an AFK, ranked servers were supposed to be down... And yet no loss prevented. I just now watched the message saying Ranked Disabled go away.

replies.body: Can you link me the exact match that this occurred in so I can take a look at what happened?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GtzwdGBX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-06T17:37:29.582+0000)
>
> Can you link me the exact match that this occurred in so I can take a look at what happened?

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2311306248/50034673 The only reason I can think of is that he's on my friends list, but that still shouldn't affect the fact that Ranked Servers were supposedly down. 

EDIT: Sorry commenting again forgot to tag you on it.

I wasn't able to find a record that ranked servers were meant to be disabled and loss-prevented to be enabled during this match. It seems the recording of the match was intended.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
